# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut)
target_compile_options(contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/provider
)
target_link_libraries(contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  providers-yt-provider
  yt-lib-schema
  yt-gateway-file
  yql-core-ut_common
  library-yql-ast
  udf-service-terminate_policy
  yql-core-services
  library-yql-core
  providers-common-gateway
  providers-common-provider
  providers-common-config
  yql-providers-config
  providers-dq-common
  providers-dq-provider
  providers-result-provider
  yql-sql-v1
  minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm
  yql-sql-pg
)
target_sources(contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/provider/ut/yql_yt_dq_integration_ut.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/provider/ut/yql_yt_epoch_ut.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/library/yql/providers/yt/provider/ut/yql_yt_cbo_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
target_allocator(contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(contrib-ydb-library-yql-providers-yt-provider-ut)
